2164.subject: VPA
2164.descrlong: This course will examine the various artistic possibilities of cultural entrepreneurship and the complexities of cultural appropriation as viewed through a critical lens of concepts, practices, and politics. Students will learn the various methodologies and techniques that are required in the construction of garments. Emphasis will be placed on the exploration and research of traditional and contemporary approaches to fashion. Students engage in critical readings & constructive group critiques.
